entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then a few rain showers or flurries beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
